page.title: 05West Haddon and amenities.
page.content: West Haddon is not very well equipped with amenities.There are approximately one tenth of the amenities listed in the Domesday Project. It has one primary school,two small food shops, two public houses, one playing field, one small hotel and one village hall. Most people go to Daventry, Rugby or Northampton for their amenities. A few travel to Coventry. Some of West Haddon's amenities are used by outsiders, these are the chapel,antique shop,hair dressers, school,public house and hotel.An important village amenity is the village hall which is used by people from all over Northamptonshire. The main things it is used for are school dinners,play school,barn dances,bingo, play sceme,jumble sales,parties,O.A.P meetings and public shows.
